snippet: Public speaking, a requirement in many jobs, also provides employment or extra income to thousands of people who travel for speaking engagements that can pay from $1,500 to more than $200,000.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column points out that public speaking, requirement in many jobs, also provides employment or extra income to thousands of people who travel for speaking engagements that can pay from $1,500 to more than $200,000.
lead_paragraph: Public speaking, a requirement in many jobs, also provides employment or extra income to thousands of people who travel for speaking engagements that can pay from $1,500 to more than $200,000.

headline.print_headline: A Few Well-Chosen Words Pay the Fare for Some
headline.seo: Public Speaking Pays the Fare for Some Business Travelers
headline.main: A Few Well-Chosen Words Pay the Fare for Some
